select count(1) from dpcoi_order dor
dor.del_flag = 0 and dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` in (1, 2)
and dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')
and dor.`PRODUCT_NO` like CONCAT('%',#{productNo},'%')
and dor.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` = #{hopeCuttingDate}
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and dor.`pfmea_delay` = #{pfmeaDelay}
and dor.`cp_delay` = #{cpDelay}
and dor.`standard_book_delay` = #{standardBookDealy}
and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AND info.`task_info_value` like CONCAT('%',#{taskOrderNo},'%'))
AND dor.`DESIGN_CHANGE_NO` like CONCAT('%',#{designChangeNo},'%')
AND dor.`product_line` like CONCAT('%',#{productLine},'%')

mapper.select: SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiWoOrderId, woorder.dpcoi_wo_order_type AS dpcoiWoOrderType, (CASE woorder.dpcoi_wo_order_state WHEN 1 THEN '待确认' WHEN 2 THEN '待上传文件' WHEN 3 THEN '待审核' WHEN 4 THEN '审核通过' WHEN 5 THEN '审核不通过' WHEN 6 THEN '作废' WHEN 7 THEN '不需要变更' ELSE '' END) AS dpcoiWoOrderState, DATE_FORMAT(woorder.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS createDateStr, user1.`USER_NAME` AS userName1, DATE_FORMAT(woorder.confirm_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS confirmDateStr, user2.`USER_NAME` AS userName2, DATE_FORMAT(woorder.file_complete_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS fileCompleteDateStr, user3.`USER_NAME` AS userName3, DATE_FORMAT(woorder.manager_confirm_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS managerConfirmDateStr FROM dpcoi_wo_order woorder LEFT JOIN sys_users user1 ON user1.`USER_ID` = woorder.`confirm_by` LEFT JOIN sys_users user2 ON user2.`USER_ID` = woorder.`file_complete_by` LEFT JOIN sys_users user3 ON user3.`USER_ID` = woorder.`manager_confirm_by` WHERE woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = #{dpcoiOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID`
